product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Deborah K Atwood
content: The echo show is a great product. We purchased two, one for us and one for our daughter in Hawaii.  It is great to drop in and visit.  She drops in over her breakfast coffee which is our lunch time.  The music sound is much improved over our old echo.  I particularly like the recipes feature where Alexa talks through the recipe step by step. Well worth the investment.
title: Awesome Product

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Kyle M
content: Where to begin.  The speakers on the echo show V2 sound fantastic with the bass produced quite literally astounding. I did have to turn the bass down just a tad to stop slight distortion at 100%. Otherwise i have clear, crisp audio on full blast with bass that easily fills a room. The large screen and amazon music are magic with lyrics scrolling across the very nice 720p display. The cooking capabilities are awesome and the ability to control my hue smart bulb lights using the built in zigbee hub is awesome! The screen although beautiful seems to be where amazon may have cheaped out or i may have just been very unlucky. I had my show running for a solid two weeks and sadly the screen couldn't keep up. I came home from work only to find long streaks going across my echo screen. For a device that is meant to be on 24/7 you'd think a better more reliable panel would've been installed. To make matters worse the policy for replacement is a joke. I called and was polity greeted to being told i'd have to send it in for repair rather than what I had expected. What should've happened is i should've had a new show sent out with prime shipping and a return label for the defective one. I understand that people lie to get a second product but that is where the customer would be charged for the second product upon failure to send back the defective one. So for now i am without my show for the next 4-5 business days. The customer should never have to experience down time or feel penalized for having a defective product. In short I love the product but am very frustrated with the support I received.
title: Amazing if you're Lucky

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal

I recently had the show echo 1st generation which still worked amazingly!! But wanted to.upgrade to the 2nd generation, I will be handing down my 1st generation echo to my daughter.
title: Great product

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: M.Case
content: The show has been most excellent. I tend spend a lot of time at my computer and this allows me to still enjoy the things I like while working from home. I use it in the kitchen to access my pinterest, and  other recipes. I love it for listening to music while I work, with integration of Iheart Radio, pandora and amazon music, i can listen to just about anything. Would have 5 stars but some of the "skills" just don't work smoothly and it has trouble with web searches or understanding what I want it to search for. I get " I don't know about that"
title: Well worth the investment for me.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Mario Gonzalez Jr.
content: I already have Echo Dots and an Echo, but my wife purchased the Echo Show for me.  It does everything that the other Echo's do and more.  It has great sound due to the subwoofer.  I really love good bass and the show does not disappoint.  It also allows us to look at our cameras, Ring, Blink and Amazon Cloud Cam cameras.  It does have a web browser and can play YouTube videos and other types of videos, but I haven't really used the Show to play videos.  I would recommend if you are looking for a great sounding Alexa device that has a screen.
title: Great Alexa Device

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Vicky Hargesheimer
content: I use this for my shopping list, music, turn lights on and off, recipes.  I am having a little trouble with one light out of 6 I have set up and it is bulbs in a ceiling light.  I haven't put the call into support yet to fix this issue.  The support is outstanding when you need help.  I do wish you had a way to bookmark recipes that you like.  I search recipes all the time and choose one for dinner.  I drop in other rooms to talk to my husband and let him know dinner is ready.  Next is the ring doorbell to add to it.
title: I love my echco show

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Bre Iversen
content: Sound and size are great. However, the light can be distracting if you don‚Äôt usually sleep with a light on, and there is no way to disable it. You can use the ‚ÄúDo Not Disturb‚Äù mode and the screen will darken, but still display the sound and alarm. As for the software, I‚Äôve had multiple issues. The first time I plugged it in, the sound didn‚Äôt work (It said Alexa was speaking but I couldn‚Äôt hear anything). Once, the screen wasn‚Äôt working (nothing displayed but Alexa could hear me). I can‚Äôt call any devices because it will cause a bug. The only way to troubleshoot the issues are to unplug, wait, and plug in the device again. Summary: A bigger screen has the drawback of being brighter and an older model has the drawback of bugs.
title: Bigger and Brighter but Buggy

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Bob Wallace
content: Can't say if we like it or not.  First Alexa could not speak to us, had to send it back for a replacement.  Next it wasn't shipped back to us, it went to our friends house in Apex, NC.  We drove up to Apex to get the Alexa and when we opened the package - NO POWER CORD!!  Has not been the best experience, will contact Amazon for the power cord.
title: What a hassle

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Cindy
content: It is interesting learning to talk to Alexa.  Understanding how to phrase things that it understands is interesting.  Some of the responses are amusing.  We enjoy the quality of the sound when we play music.  The screen quality is quite good as well.  I did not realize you set up a lot of things from your phone.
title: New Device

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Diane B
content: It took me a while to bite the bullet and get onto the Alexa bandwagon, but I am loving it. I love the Echo Show. I haven't figured out how to make video calls to other Echo Show owners yet, but I will. There is SO MUCH that Alexa can do and I've only scratched the surface/ I'm very happy to be on this bandwagon.
title: Glad to have my Echo Show

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Quililantes
content: I never wasted to be Alexa enabled, but the technology came with the new home we just purchased. I especially love the Echo show, because I can see recipes, see the info concerning the music I‚Äôm listening to, and control lighting, locking and unlocking my doors, etc. I highly recommend this device!
title: I Love Being Alexa Enabled!

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Nic0418
content: I have my Echo Show in my kitchen so I can listen to the weather and news while I‚Äôm making my morning coffee. I also use it for recipes and to play music while I‚Äôm cooking. The platform integrates nicely with Apple Music and my Ring doorbell system. It‚Äôs an excellent addition to any smart home.
title: Love it in my kitchen!!

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Sigga317
content: Not actually  worth the money.  Needs way more skills . This is my first  experience  with a device  of this sort . I was very excited,  but let down hard.
title: Needs more functionality.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Phanessa
content: I wanted to write an initial review and provide updates later. I‚Äôm happy with the picture quality when I check I‚Äôm on my kids. I ordered a stand for it because it doesn‚Äôt tilt or move and I was only able to see the top of my kids foreheads. I haven‚Äôt figured out the audio setting but it has too much bass for my liking. ‚ÄúDropping in‚Äù With the dot was horrible because of the sound quality so I‚Äôm much happier with the Echo Show.
title: So far so good

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Harvey G. Linkous
content: Purchasing this along with my other Alexa enabled devices to make my home smart, has been one of the best decisions I have made in years. It is a little bit expensive to buy all of the items however I think it is well worth it for the ease of life they have brought to my home. Been disabled it is very convenient to be able to use voice command for so many functions. I very much hope and look forward to improvements in the Alexa system in the future.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: TD
content: It's the same Alexa but with a bigger screen, which really looks nice, especially when making video calls. Like its predecessors,  it doesn't always get what your asking but I'm used to that. Sound is full and better bass response. I did notice though that at full volume, it kind of fades in and out a little as if there was some type of compression or limiter on the audio. Otherwise, if your looking for a larger Echo show, you will be pleased
title: Very happy with it!

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Vincent
content: I got this to use with my ring doorbell and I love it. Also cycles through pictures off my IG and FB so it also doubles as one of those digital picture frames. I can make calls thru Alexa on it, It shows me who's at the door and I can interact with visitors from indoors which is helpful during the pandemic. I could go on forever at all the neat things this echoshow does but you would have to try it for yourself. You will not be dissapointed.
title: Great device!

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Timothy J Lakata
content: Love the new show.  Big beautiful screen and excellent sound quality.  She really can do just about anything and she‚Äôs getting smarter every day!
title: How did we live without Alexa?

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Sara C
content: Works well, sound quality is good, volume goes higher than I anticipated. The only flaw I found was the inability to drop in on my mother, because she has more than one device and if they‚Äôre on the same phone number it doesn‚Äôt know where to call, something that might want to be considered in the future revisions of this device and other echos... ie, using IPs to separate contacts for drop in rather than phone number, or the ability to call a specific device.
title: Nice picture and sound

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Suzanne West
content: I upgraded to this echo and still happy that I did but I do have a small complaint.  When I touch on the video to play I have to touch it multiple times to get it to start! It's not that way for any other the features (such as the music app, etc.). Otherwise, I like the sound and the picture quality. I would still recommend this!

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Robert M. Ring
content: Easy to use, although I wish there were more printed instructions with it. Our grandkids are far away and this is wonderful, especially since they can do it with a voice command. Picture and sound are great. Glad I bought generation 2 versions Amazing how you can call and not use the actual phone of the other person. Well worth the price. The quality of the sound it can produce is amazing. Gr and kids just say "alexa, call grandpa" and away we go.
title: Great to talk to grandkids.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Vincent Mcelroy
content: I love the device, unfortunately I‚Äôm one of the few who has been plagued with serious WiFi issues. Device worked flawlessly for about a month and suddenly started to drop the Wi-Fi, after numerous resets and chats with Amazon I‚Äôm left with no other choice but to give this horrible review. The bad part is, this device was a x-mas gift for my wife and she loved.
title: Serious Wi-Fi issues

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: LinBar
content: Though I have echo dot in other rooms, having a large screen in the kitchen is nice.  I use it as a photo display and as a way to see recipes.  I am having some difficulty getting my recipes on the screen, but if I do a search, I can find recipes and read from the screen as I am preparing the food.  Just a nice addition.
title: Fun to have in the kitchen

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: S PK
content: I have 6 Echo products and I love all of them, but the show really takes this type of device to a new level.  We listen to a lot of music and the Show has the lyrics to every song scrolling on the screen.  The speakers are quite good too, and putting it in a corner or next to a wall will give you great sound and good bass.  It has so many great functions, I will definitely replace all of my Echo devices with the Show over the next few months.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Steve Ferguson
content: A year into owning Echo, Echo Spot, Ring Security and Ring Doorbell, I was missing a feature I wanted and that is to conveniently see who rang my video doorbell. With the newest edition to my system, the Echo Show, I can quickly and easily view my front door. The sound quality, compared to the Echo, is more rich and widely dispersed and Alexa is able to hear us from further away. I am finding many ways to use the other video features including showing photos and news briefs. The touch screen provides and additional interface for configuring Alexa and my devices. I am glad I upgraded.
title: Step up from Echo to Echo Show is worth it

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: K. Cole
content: I've got an echo show now, and it's  fantastic.  I used a google screen device for a couple of years, but have switched to the echo for a number of reasons.  I've got two dots and a 3rd gen echo, in addition to this echo show.  The integration with the rest of their software, and with our shopping and online habits, is very good.  The screen on this is beautiful.  I heartily endorse this model.
title: Great device!!

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Sheenah
content: Like the larger screen. Easy to see across room. May need to retrain as doesnt always understand. Like newer feature to show the commands on screen, at least some, and can see result such as ‚Äúlight off‚Äù and shows a switch off.
title: Much wider- nice screen

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: J. Jackson
content: We've put it in the kitchen, and the large display is great for multiple timers. We've also started watching/listening to shows from Hulu on it while we're cooking. It's just as good for Alexa as any echo device. But, we find that it doesn't always listen as well as other nearby echoes, so we have to be sure were talking to the right one. The display is crystal clear, love it. But the sound is just okay, nothing spectacular. All in all, we're happy with it, but there is some room for improvement.
title: The larger display is great!

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Jim Sanders
content: Compared to the 7" model, the 10" model both the sound and the video looks much better. Sitting at the kitchen table, watching the various offered videos, the size and resolution of the screen is enough to be comfortable. The 7" was not. The video calling is much more pleasant. Alexa did not graduate to the fourth grade with the larger unit.
title: A better size - audeo and video

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: labchic97
content: This echo show is the best out of all the alexa/echo devices! Great sound great size screen, very responsive and pretty handy for videos From YouTube and the grands love watching Hulu on it. I also like the fact that I can link it to my ring devices and see what is going on outside my house. Great purchase!!
title: I Love it!!!

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Monte
content: Ordered a new echo show. It had an issue (popping sound). After 45 minutes arranging an  exchange, we finally recieve it, but it's a REFURBISHED UNIT.. AND. no power supply. Amazon is going down the toilet with their customer service. I've been a loyal customer for years but now will try anywhere else first.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: R. Fell

We love that we can watch shows/movies on the show. We start a movie while in the kitchen and finish it in the living room. Happy with purchase.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Nova
content: Easy to set up, overall very good, except for one issue. Display only stays on for approximately ten minutes after last function used, then screen reverts back to displaying time. If you want to see notifications you have make a verbal request. Haven't found any way to change this issue.
title: Very good but needs some improvement

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Jn
content: The picture is very clear and the sound is very good. My only complaint is that the IMDb freedive station which I can access on amazon prime app on my Apple TV does not work on the echo. It‚Äôs bad enough that you can‚Äôt access Netflix and I was ok with that but I‚Äôm very surprised that IMDb freedive can not be viewed on echo. It‚Äôs very frustrating!
title: Good but limited!

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Geoff Charles
content: I love the music and sound quality of the Echo Show, but I am a bit disappointed with its knowledge limitations. It does a great job with music setup, weather, directions and other straight forward information, but it often lacks any information on common items and questions. I love to sing along when the words to songs come up on the screen, but I wish there was a way for it to automatically switch between music sources. Currently, one must choose a default music source. The graphics for pictures is awesome.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Richard McDougall
content: I have an original Echo Show and it seemed to work perfectly - the 2nd generation is great with the larger screen, but it is hard to see any other improvements on the consumer use side.  Maybe I expected more of an upgraded version - I am not dissatisfied with the purchase, just not excited.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Andreia Bates
content: Pros: 1. Great at voice recognition from a range of different voices; quiet to loud and young to old 2. Great at simple tasks such as making announcements, setting reminders, basic searches (recipes, etc), weather, timers, Amazon music integration, Hulu integration to name a few 3. Easy to use and set up 4. Excellent sound 5. Funny hidden abilities (cat in a box, jokes, etc) Cons: 1. No battery backup so if you move it, it has to restart 2. Sometimes freezes or is confused on things beyond basic tasks 3. If you want to revisit a previously used app, it's not straightforward how to get back to it without repeating initial command.
title: Better than expected

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: MK
content: Love the big screen, bought this to view my new Toucan Wireless Outdoor Camera and Video Doorbell. Asking Alexa to show me the front door and drive way it shows high quality live image on the big screen, and I can see who is ringing my doorbell. The speaker is much better than any other Echo device improved the sound quality.
title: Love the big screen to see with my Toucan Video Doorbell

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: H.G.
content: She has terrible ‚Äúhearing‚Äù.  The previous Exho show I bought was far better at responding when we said Alexa while she was playing music or game. This one can‚Äôt hear you.  I don‚Äôt like it.  Wish I had either a refund or an upgrade.
title: Not as good as original Echo Show.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Tee in Cocoa, Florida
content: Bought this for my Mother in law that just became a grandmother by her youngest son and she lives in Florida and the grand-baby in Utah. She was always sadden by the fact she does not see her grandson often enough. We set it up and had them call her right away. The tears of joy in her eyes knowing, she can see her grandson anytime is worth more than the weight of all gold. We did good.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Charles C.
content: This is a very simple device to set up and use on a regular basis.  It is much more responsive to voice commands than the original echo and the screen is very clear and responsive.  The only question I have is the amount of data that is sent over the wi-fi and consequently the internet connection.  Unfortunately I live in a rural area and am limited to 15 gig per month.  Something is eating my data limit in 5 days and I kind of suspect the new echo.
title: user friendly

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Becky M.
content: This item was returned because there was no sound.  We called customer support and they confirmed that the item was defective.  Since this was purchased on sale, we were told to purchase another at a much higher price and they would credit our account for the difference.  Item has been returned; waiting for credit.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Linda R Taylor
content: We have several Alexa devices now, including 3 Echo Show's.  This is the nicest one yet!  The only thing I don't like is the absence of a plug in for headphones.  It does have Bluetooth which is nice, but my husband prefers the plug in.  Still giving 5 stars because of everything else is excellent.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Florida Reader
content: Find myself enjoying the EchonShow. Video calls with family are easy and have good quality. Easy to pull up recipes. The best part was when your visitors learn it answered questions and the spent an hour asking question and watching videos about sharks. Great easy to use addition to my home, love pairing it with my hue lights!!
title: Great addition for all ages

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Robert E. Wilkes
content: Great sound from such a small device.  Quite intuitive when you‚Äôre trying to remember a song as well.  Getting the exact order to play certain things can be tricky as it‚Äôs a matter of semantics to hear free nighttime stories versus subscribing to a books club.  Can not confirm nor deny it uses sorcery.  Also has a nice mute feature so it does not wake up any time someone within a 5 mile radius says anything remotely similar to ‚ÄúAlexa‚Äù.
title: Nifty product that you will actually use more than expected.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Andrew L.
content: Got the Echo Show for Christmas and set it up in the kitchen, mainly to set timers and watch football when I cook. I connected Hulu Live and it works great; however, I do wish it came with a remote... trying to switch channels can be cumbersome unless you tell it exactly what channel you want to watch, e.g. ‚Äútune to ESPN‚Äù There are many more cool features but one other that I like the beat is the digital timer. When using a regular echo device to set timers, I constantly ask Alexa how much time is left but on the show I can see the time remaining. Would definitely recommend!
title: Great for watching football in your kitchen!

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: David Sides
content: I have recently taken the steps to almost fully turn my home into a smart home with Alexa enabled devices. I did have a Echo Spot in my open kitchen/living room but i felt that it was not really what I needed. The speakers are the main reason i upgraded but I did not realize how much I would enjoy just asking Alexa to find me recipes and not having to print it out or get food particles all over my phone. Also with the use of some of the available apps and skills it can give you a TV where you didn't have one before. I used to not be able to see my TV while i was at the stove but now i can watch TV while I am Cooking. When all is said and done if you want a device in you kitchen space I think that this is the one to go with, but other than that I am not sure if it fits anywhere else in the home.
title: Awesome for the Kitchen

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: G. Hinote
content: Great sound quality . I also like the integrated hub.I control my tv, microwave,lights,alarm,and my thermostat  I placed it on my kitchen table and enjoy listening to music or podcasts while eating. I use it to access my video doorbell when I am in the kitchen and video call or message my friends and family.  I love it.
title: Great addition to my smart home.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Jeffrey A. Lundy
content: We love the bigger 10.1 inch screen and it looks and sounds great in our kitchen where we use it to get new step-by-step meal recipes and listen to music. Easy to navigate to YOUTUBE for home fix it instructions. Great sound for Amazon music and videos on YOUTUBE and Amazon Prime Movies.
title: Great sound for Amazon music and videos on YOUTUBE and Amazon Prime Movies.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: ali foster
content: Awful speech recognition, compared with other devices.  Also, Alexa doesn't seem to understand simple questions, unless phrased exactly as the system is programmed (unlike intuitive systems like Android and Siri).  Lastly, installing apps is a pain- you have to do it from another device.  1 star for ease of ordering toilet paper, but such a pain to do everything else.
title: Dumbest "smart device" ever...

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: ashley
content: My family and I couldn‚Äôt be more obsessed with this. It‚Äôs in our kitchen and we use it all day long. Sometimes I wonder how we lived without it. We have Alexa in every room including the bathrooms. We use her for a timer, recipes, the weather, and to play music and my kids love asking her silly questions. If you don‚Äôt have one you NEED one!
title: Alexa is part of the family

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: spoiledpuppies
content: I bought 4 for my family so we can easily communicate with each other.  Very easy to use and a great way to check in.  Picture is very clear.  I keep it in the kitchen and use it to chat, play stand-up comedy or listen to music while I cook.  It's also very helpful for maintaining my shopping and to-do lists.
title: Great way to keep in touch

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Robert
content: The Echo Show had a much better user interface than the Echo tower I had used.  That said, many more improvements are needed.  It could not answer questions about hourly temperatures but could display them on the screen.  The sound quality is great but there is almost too much bass.  It's nice that there is a control for this.  Very useful to have in the kitchen.  You can look at recipes while listening to your favorite music.
title: Improved User Interface

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Not a "Home." fan
content: Sound quality is great.  Really thought it could do far more rhan it can, however.  Had been usin an ipad on an easel in my kitchen, so was used to being able to watch my live cable TV (Xfinity stream), Netflix, etc through that.  The show doesn't allow you to watch those apps and what you can watch is VERY limited.  This is basically an echo with a screen that can't do much... That's not to say many people won't love it, however, it was not great for my needs.  Will return and await a black friday deal on a smaller show.
title: Not much video usage available

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Bruce Anderson
content: If you want a perfect product keep looking.  Cannot turn off the camera while the screen stays awake.  Cannot get rid of Things to Try no matter what you do.  The menu is not the easiest to navigate.  Those are my primary complaints.  It does Alexa stuff fairly well.  Giving Alexa screen has proven difficult for Amazon.
title: Good hardware, but software needs work

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: R. Gowen
content: I may come to like it better, but I encountered a problem with Alexa response when playing music.  When I ask for a song, and Alexa finds a different and not pleasing song, it won't respond to a stop command.  I have to get up and use the screen to stop.  That is is a pretty fundamental fail. content: My Mom is a very active 91.  I wasn't sure if she could adjust to Echo but she did so in under a week. The only negative comment I have about this product was the requirement to have a smart phone for set up/authentication.  I am sure she's the exception but that was a pain to deal with. product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Acoustic Engineer
content: Use the Amazon Fire Stick Ethernet Adapter, ASIN: B074TC662N ( https://www.amazon.com/Amazon-Ethernet-Adapter-Fire-Devices/dp/B074TC662N ). Don't forget to use the power supply for the Ethernet adapter. I first turned off my routers WIFI so the EchoShow2 would not automatically connect to WIFI. Enter a fixed IP, like 192.168.1.101. Enter the router's gateway IP, like 192.168.1.1. Enter network prefix by entering this number: 24. Enter first DNS same as your router, like 192.168.1.1. Enter second DNS as 8.8.8.8. It will go to your wired network quickly and download the latest firmware.
title: ETHERNET PORT WORKS

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Hope Van Epps
content: I find the shopping list to be awful and way behind on today's technology. You can't add multiple items at a time without stating the command with each item. It doesn't categorize so you end up with a long list in random order which is a pain when shopping. It seems the designers put no creative effort in product development. If you synch another app with a better list, you can't change the default on Alexa or delete the Alexa shopping list. Essentially, Amazon designs one of the most vanilla apps and then forces you to be stuck with it. Lately, our Alexa has been interrupting us with its own ideas of what it wants to show us which makes me wonder if Amazon is starting a partnership with advertisers.  The call video feature is nice and the music ability but overall I'd say Alexa isn't very AI smart in comparison to other products. Hopefully, product development will go back to the drawing board.
title: The Alexa default shopping list stinks and you can't change or delete it

author: Richard L. Coffey
content: After initial setup, the sound would not work.  After many trial fixes, I finally called customer service and was told there was a software glitch causing the issue. I was told a software fix via update would be forthcoming, but after a recent power outage, I realized the problem still exists.  If power at the outlet is interrupted or unplugged, I have to go through a factory reset again.  Also, my touchscreen is not very receptive - repeated taps are required to get a response.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: BRADLEY E SHUTES
content: My primary complaint about the first gen Show was the horrible touchscreen display.  The only way to see photographs clearly was to view it straight on.  Any movement to off-angle resulted in a washed out mess.  The second gen is only slightly better in that regard to the first gen. It still has an annoying wash-out appearance when viewed off angle, but the angle appears to be a bit wider.  This is likely due to the larger dimensions of the display, and not any change to the underlying display technology.  For the display tech nerds out there, this is very likely an edge-lit TN type LCD (ie the worst of the worst for image quality)  If you're expecting an IPS or OLED and would be disappointed with anything as low quality as a TN type then you might as well skip this device.  The sound quality, however, is much better in my opinion.  The base is deeper for sure.  Because of the improved sound alone I decided to overlook the screen deficiencies and keep it.  It still makes a good Echo device and the best alarm clock you could possibly purchase right now.
title: After trying the first gen, the second gen is a keeper, but just barely.

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Jbird
content: I have many Alexa devices, and really liked the original show quite a bit.  The addition of the video was such a huge improvement over the original devices.  I had to try this new Show (2nd Gen) as my biggest concern with the original Show was that the screen was too small for kitchen/living room use.  I like to check my schedule, weather, recipes, watch videos, etc. while cooking and it was originally a tad small for that from across the room.  This new Show seems the perfect size for the kitchen.  My only issue is that the speakers have moved from the front on the 1st gen (facing where you would be standing in front of the device) to the back of the 2nd gen Show.  I have mine on the corner counter (8 inches from the wall) in the kitchen, and between being in the corner, and with cabinets above, it now sounds a bit like its muffled in a tunnel.  I know some people originally complained because the 1st gen Show looked like a micro old projector TV, but that didn't bother me.  In an effort to streamline and make the screen bigger, the speakers were moved to the rear.  Just something to keep in mind when deciding where to place this device (and the reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars).  I am happy with it, however, as the screen is a great size, crisp and a wonderful companion for the kitchen/living room!
title: Good improvements...

product: Echo Show (2nd Gen) | Premium 10.1‚Äù HD smart display with Alexa ‚Äì stay connected with video calling - Charcoal
author: Tomcat
content: I have two major issues with the screen: A.  It seems to sense ambient light (or knows the time of day and operates from that) and adjusts the brightness.  The problem is that it is not bright enough in low light making it hard to see.  There should be a manual brightness adjustment available as well as an automatic mode. B.  The clock is too small and impossible to read from a distance.  The digital clock should have a multiple size option from current size to full screen.  Also a twelve hour clock and an analog clock display would be nice. In general, the Echo Show may have a number of display options, but I'm not sure they are really useful.  Why watch a movie on the 10" screen when the big TV with better quality video and sound is nearby.  I do like the seven day weather display.  One of the nicest features (also available on all Echo devices) is the "drop in" and "announce" feature turning all the Echos into an intercom system throughout the house.  Overall, I'm not sure it's worth the money given its limited use.
title: Limited in ability to control display
